column3: too extended or overly flexed (fatigue if sustained)
too extended or overly flexed (fatigue if sustained)
strongly flexed (causing significant muscular load), with rotated (leading to torsional strain) and side-bent (causing muscle imbalance and fatigue)
bent forward 20 to 60 degrees (causing increased spinal loading), with tilted sideways (leading to muscle imbalance and fatigue)
